json_to_edit.voice_over: One mural can spark a thousand revolutions.
json_to_edit.description: Zephyr creates a powerful mural that ignites a city-wide movement.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant sirens, spray paint hiss, footsteps
json_to_edit.name: The Spark of Revolution
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A street artist's mural becomes the catalyst for social change.

qa.action: Panoramic view of the city skyline at night, focusing on the warehouse district.

hf.action: Zephyr approaches a large blank wall, carrying bags of spray paint.

tr.action: Zephyr's determined eyes as they survey the blank canvas before them.

xc.action: Zephyr begins to paint, their movements fluid and purposeful.

ka.action: A series of quick cuts showing the progress of the mural.

fn.action: The completed mural is revealed, a powerful image of hope and rebellion.

af.action: People begin to gather, staring in awe at the mural.

qo.action: Various reactions from onlookers, some taking photos with their phones.

fp.action: The crowd grows larger, spreading out from the mural like a ripple effect.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: One mural can spark a thousand revolutions.
updated_json.description: Zephyr creates a powerful mural that ignites a city-wide movement.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant sirens, spray paint hiss, footsteps

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "tr", "ka", and "qo" from the original list of 9 shots. we'll update the "list_display_order" accordingly and adjust the "number_of_shots" to reflect the new total. all other information in the json will remain the same.
